editions.effect:
**%Immortal%Immortality%**, **Spellshroud**

[Guo Jia Bonus] (4), [REST]: As a Spell, **suppress** another target item, weapon, or ally. Activate this ability only once.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever you **suppress** an object, put a **quest** counter on %Fabled Emerald Fatestone%your champion%.

[REST]: You may remove eight **quest** counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform CARDNAME.
editions.effect_raw:
Immortality, Spellshroud

[Guo Jia Bonus] (4), REST: As a Spell, suppress another target item, weapon, or ally. Activate this ability only once.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever you suppress an object, put a quest counter on your champion.

REST: You may remove eight quest counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Emerald Fatestone.

other_orientations.effect:
**Spellshroud**, **Vigor**

[Guo Jia Bonus] The first Animal or Beast ally card you activate each turn costs 2 less to activate.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Beast allies you control lose **pride**.
other_orientations.effect_raw:
Spellshroud, Vigor

[Guo Jia Bonus] The first Animal or Beast ally card you activate each turn costs 2 less to activate.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Beast allies you control lose pride.

rule.description: If a transformed double-faced object would enter the graveyard from the field, it goes to the default location that the front would go. In this case, a regalia goes to its owner's banishment.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: ".. put a quest counter on Fabled Emerald Fatestone." -> ".. put a quest counter on your champion."

The suppression ability can only be used once per object instance. If Fabled Emerald Fatestone would leave the field and return as a new instance, its controller will be able to use this ability again.
If Fabled Emerald Fatestone is suppressed, it will still trigger its ability to give your champion a quest counter.

effect_html: Immortality, SpellshroudGuo Jia Bonus 4,: As a Spell, suppress another target item, weapon, or ally. Activate this ability only once.Guo Jia Bonus Whenever you suppress an object, put a quest counter on your champion.: You may remove eight quest counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Emerald Fatestone.
